event.title: is celebrated yearly on the 21st of December

data.event: The Patronal Feast is celebrated yearly on the 21st of December from the town's original founding date of 1792.
On September 15, 1792, Santo Tomas was severed from its parent Minalin, Pampanga.
On January 2, 1905, it was ceded to San Fernando, Pampanga until 1905.
On October 12, 1951, Executive Order No. 476 (issued by Elpidio Quirino) created Santo Tomas and its five barrios of San Matias, San Vicente, San Bartolome, Sto.
